# thecloud_vpcs (Data Source)

VPCs data source allows you to list all available VPCs.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `vpcs` (Attributes List) List of VPCs. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--vpcs))

<a id="nestedatt--vpcs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `vpcs`

Read-Only:

- `cidr_block` (String) The IPv4 CIDR block for the VPC.
- `id` (String) The ID of the VPC.
- `name` (String) The name of the VPC.
- `status` (String) The status of the VPC.
